SELECT distinct vc.BIN_CardId as cardId, vc.CardCode as cardCode, vc.CardType as cardType, vc.MobilePhone as mobilePhone, vc.Amount as amount, vc.DepositAmount as depositAmount, vc.TotalAmount as totalAmount, vc.LastDepositAmount as lastDepositAmount, CONVERT(nvarchar(20),vc.LastDepositTime,120) as lastDepositTime, vc.State as state, mif.TestType as testType, #dateType# as dateType, oz.DepartName as departName, oz.DepartCode as departCode FROM Members.BIN_StoredValueCard vc with(nolock) JOIN () A99 ON vc.BIN_OrganizationID=A99.BIN_OrganizationID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz on (vc.BIN_OrganizationID=oz.BIN_OrganizationID) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberInfo mif on (vc.BIN_MemberInfoId=mif.BIN_MemberInfoID) WHERE vc.BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# AND vc.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# AND vc.ValidFlag = '1' AND vc.State != 'ST'
(oz.TestType!='1' OR oz.TestType IS NULL) AND (mif.TestType!='0' OR mif.TestType IS NULL)
(oz.TestType='1' OR mif.TestType='0')
oz.DepartCode = #counterCode#
vc.CardCode = #cardCode#
vc.MobilePhone = #mobilePhone#
vc.State = #cardState#

SELECT c.BIN_CardId as cardId, c.CardCode as cardCode, c.CardType as cardType, CONVERT(varchar, c.TransactionTime, 120) as transactionTime, c.BillCode as billCode, c.RelevantCode as relevantCode, c.TransactionType as transactionType, c.ComputeSign*Amount as amount, c.GiftAmount as giftAmount, c.TotalAmount as totalAmount, c.Discount as discount, c.ValidFlag as validFlag, o.DepartName as departName FROM Members.BIN_CardTransaction c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization o with(nolock) ON (c.BIN_OrganizationID=o.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE c.BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# AND c.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# AND c.ValidFlag = '1'
c.CardCode = #cardCode#
o.DepartCode = #counterName#
c.TransactionType=#transactionType#
#fromDate# <= CONVERT(varchar(10), c.TransactionTime, 120)
#toDate# >= CONVERT(varchar(10), c.TransactionTime, 120)
GROUP BY c.BIN_CardId , c.CardCode , c.CardType , CONVERT(varchar, c.TransactionTime, 120), c.BillCode , c.RelevantCode , c.TransactionType , c.ComputeSign*Amount , c.GiftAmount , c.TotalAmount, c.Discount , c.ValidFlag , o.DepartName

SELECT c.CardCode as cardCode, c.CardType as cardType, o.DepartName as departName, CONVERT(varchar, c.TransactionTime, 120) as transactionTime, c.BillCode as billCode, c.RelevantCode as relevantCode, c.TransactionType as transactionType, c.ComputeSign*Amount as amount, c.GiftAmount as giftAmount, c.TotalAmount as totalAmount, c.ServiceType as serviceType, c.Discount as discount, c.ServiceQuantity as serviceQuantity, s.Quantity as quantity, s.TotalQuantity as totalQuantity FROM Members.BIN_CardTransaction c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization o with(nolock) ON (c.BIN_OrganizationID=o.BIN_OrganizationID) LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_ServiceCard s with(nolock) ON (s.BIN_CardId=c.BIN_CardId AND c.ServiceType=s.ServiceType) WHERE c.BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# AND c.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# AND c.ValidFlag = '1' AND c.BillCode = #billCode# AND c.CardCode = #cardCode#

SELECT A.transactionTime, (CASE WHEN A.billCode=B.RelevantCode THEN B.transactionType ELSE A.transactionType END) AS transactionType, A.amount, A.billCode FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CONVERT(varchar(10),TransactionTime,120) AS transactionTime, TransactionType AS transactionType, Amount AS amount, BillCode AS billCode FROM Members.BIN_CardTransaction c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization o with(nolock) ON (c.BIN_OrganizationID=o.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE c.TransactionType!='RU' AND c.BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# AND c.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# AND c.CardCode=#cardCode# AND c.ValidFlag = '1' )A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT transactionType, BillCode, RelevantCode FROM Members.BIN_CardTransaction c LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization o with(nolock) ON (c.BIN_OrganizationID=o.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE c.BIN_OrganizationInfoID=#organizationInfoId# AND c.BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId# AND transactionType='RU' AND CardCode=#cardCode# AND c.ValidFlag = '1' )B ON A.billCode=B.RelevantCode
A.billCode = #billCode#
#fromDate# <= CONVERT(varchar(10), A.transactionTime, 120)
#toDate# >= CONVERT(varchar(10), A.transactionTime, 120)
